analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/36/0x9efde0be81f11a7e4da92f2b8a6db184af3a5bfe.sol:
	Contract BancorKiller has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/36/0x9efde0be81f11a7e4da92f2b8a6db184af3a5bfe.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/36/0x9efde0be81f11a7e4da92f2b8a6db184af3a5bfe.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/36/0x9efde0be81f11a7e4da92f2b8a6db184af3a5bfe.sol#1): it allows old versions
